name: hoverlookup
description: Instantly see what IDs, codes, and numbers in your code mean by hovering over them

hoverLookup.enableJsonDatabase.description: Enable or disable JSON database lookups (lookup-database.json files)

hoverLookup.databasePaths.description: Paths to lookup database JSON files (relative to workspace root or absolute paths). Files are searched in order - if a match is found in the first file, subsequent files are not searched.

hoverLookup.mongodbUrl.description: MongoDB connection URL (e.g., mongodb://localhost:27017 or mongodb+srv://user:pass@cluster.mongodb.net). Leave empty to disable MongoDB.

hoverLookup.mongodbDatabases.description: MongoDB database names to search in (e.g., ["db1", "db2", "db3"]). Collections will be searched in each database in order - if a match is found in the first database, subsequent databases are not searched.

searchFields.description: Fields to use as lookup keys (e.g., ["id", "slug"]). First match wins.

project.description: MongoDB projection to select specific fields (e.g., {"id": 1, "name": 1, "email": 1}). Use 1 to include fields, 0 to exclude. Reduces data transfer and memory usage.

hoverLookup.mongodbCollections.description: MongoDB collections to search and their configuration. Example: [{"collection": "users", "searchFields": ["id", "slug"], "project": {"id": 1, "name": 1}}]

hoverLookup.maxHoverSize.description: Maximum size (in characters) of the hover tooltip content. Large documents will be truncated. Default: 5000 characters.
